# üéÇfrozen cake (Crypto)

B√†i n√†y h·ªç ƒë∆∞a s·∫µn 1 file task v√† 1 file output

{% code title="task.py" %}
```python
from Crypto.Util.number import getPrime
import os

flag = os.getenv("FLAG", "FakeCTF{warmup_a_frozen_cake}")
m = int(flag.encode().hex(), 16)

p = getPrime(512)
q = getPrime(512)

n = p*q

print("n =", n)
print("a =", pow(m, p, n))
print("b =", pow(m, q, n))
print("c =", pow(m, n, n))

```
{% endcode %}

{% code title="output.txt" %}
```
n = 
a = 
b = 
c = 

```
{% endcode %}

B√†i n√†y ch·ªâ c·∫ßn √°p d·ª•ng Phi h√†m Euler

$$
\\
\varphi(n)=n-q-p+1
\\
q,p\neq m\implies (m,n)=1\implies m^{\varphi(n)}\equiv 1(mod\ n)
\\
m^{p}\equiv a (mod\ n) 
\\
m^{p}\equiv b (mod\ n) 
\\
m^{n}\equiv c (mod\ n) 
\\
m^{p}m^{p}=m^{n}m^{\varphi(n)}m
\\
\Rightarrow ab\equiv mc (mod\ n)
\\
\Rightarrow abd \equiv m(mod\ n)\ \\(cd\equiv 1(mod\ n))
$$

‚Äã

{% code title="solve.py" %}
```python
n = 
a = 
b = 
c = 
m=a*b*pow(c,-1,n)%n
flag=bytes.fromhex(hex(m)[2:])
print(flag)

```
{% endcode %}

Flag `CakeCTF{oh_you_got_a_tepid_cake_sorry}`
